properties.entry: INSERT INTO BOARD(BOARD_NO, MEMBER_NO, TITLE, CONTENT, COUNT, CREATE_DATE) VALUES(SEQ_BNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, 0, SYSDATE)
INSERT INTO FLEAMARKET(BOARD_NO, CATEGORY, PRICE) VALUES(SEQ_BNO.CURRVAL, ?, ?)
INSERT INTO STORES(BOARD_NO, CATEGORY, OPEN_TIME, CLOSE_TIME, ADDRESS) VALUES(SEQ_BNO.CURRVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?)
INSERT INTO JOBS(BOARD_NO, ADDRESS, JOB_DATE) VALUES(SEQ_BNO.CURRVAL, ?, ?)
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT(FILE_NO, BOARD_NO, AT_NAME, AT_CHANGE, AT_PATH, AT_DATE, FILE_LEVEL) VALUES(SEQ_ANO.NEXTVAL, SEQ_BNO.CURRVAL, ?, ?, ?, SYSDATE, ?)
SELECT * FROM BOARD JOIN FLEAMARKET USING(BOARD_NO)
